DOC.brief_title: Nasal Spray With Glucose Oxidase Preventing Common Cold Pre-school Children
DOC.detailed_description: Children 4 year age public day care invite participate prospective study . The child start visit ENT doctor inclusion child start spray twice daily glucose oxidase+glucose saline+glucose 3 month . During period parent ask fill home protocol record upper respiratory tract symptom : rhinitis , cough , fever , ear ache . After 6 week 12 week child schedule visit ENT department , ENT doctor examine throat , nasal cavity ear drum otitis medium . After 12 week treatment nasopharyngeal swab take bacterial culture .
